summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3759 for the improvement of the alley between block 2, Pettit's University Addition, and block 10, Assessor's Plat of University Heights Addition, from East 47th Street to East 50th Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 46241, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
